tokens.text: specifies the water rendering settings for Vibrant Visuals mode

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Biome Water Identifier
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Set the identifier used for rendering water in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Water JSON schemas under the "water" directory. Biomes without this component will have default water settings.

fields.title: Water Identifier
fields.description: Identifier of water definition to use
